Brothers: A Tale of Two Sons - it's emotional, very adult adventure 
involving players in a world of magic and personal experiences. The 
game tells us the story of the two sons, who are desperately trying 
to find a cure for his dying father. In order to save the Pope, they 
must find a "water of life", relying only on each other to realize 
their goal.
